title: Glasgow 2014
name: People's Palace and Winter Gardens
hours: People's Palace Tu-Th, Sa 10AM–5PM, F, Su 11AM–5PM, closed M; Winter Gardens Daily 10AM-5PM
content: Near the Glasgow Green Hockey Centre, the People's Palace is a great folk museum, telling the history of Glasgow and its people, from various perspectives, displaying details of Glasgow life. The Winter Gardens, adjacent, is a pleasant greenhouse with a reasonable cafe.
